H0.text: Carrying oxygen to the lungs is a function of the digestive system of the human body.

H1.text: Sending signals from the brain to the spinal cord is a function of the digestive system of the human body.

H2.text: Breaking down food into nutrients is a function of the digestive system of the human body.

H3.text: Providing support for the body is a function of the digestive system of the human body.

A4.text: Digestion involves the breakdown of food into smaller and smaller components, until they can be absorbed and assimilated into the body.
